message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exclusive product. I think you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm! However, I'm looking to get a better deal.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob! However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $10,500. I can do $11,200, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Alice, I understand your position. Let's split the difference. I'm willing to pay $10,800 for the product. This is a fair price for both of us and allows us to reach an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Alice, I'm close to my budget. Let's settle this. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. This is a good compromise for both of us and avoids further back and forth.

I understand you're close to your budget, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $11,000. I can do $11,200, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let's meet in the middle!
